Job Posting:171682 - Position: F25 Backend Engineer (Co-op) 171682 Co-op Work Term Posted: 2025 - Fall App Deadline Application Method: Posting Goes Live: Job Posting Status: 08/13/2025 09:00 AM Through Employer Website 07/30/2025 02:25 PM Approved ORGANIZATION INFORMATION Organization Address Line 1 City Postal Code / Zip Code Province / State Country League Inc. 225 King Street West Toronto M5V 3C6 ON Canada JOB POSTING INFORMATION Placement Term <b> Job Title <b> Position Type Job Location Country Duration Work Mode Salary Currency Salary Job Description 2025 - Fall F25 Backend Engineer (Co-op) 171682 Co-op Position Remote Canada 4 months Fully Remote CAD Salary Not Available, 0 Major List Job Title: Backend Engineer (Co-op) - Fall Term About League Founded in 2014, and with a total funding currently at $220 million; League is a platform technology company powering next- generation healthcare consumer experiences. Payers, providers, consumer health partners and employers build on League's platform to deliver high-engagement, personalized healthcare experiences consumers love. Millions of people use solutions powered by League to access, navigate and pay for care. Build the Engine of Our Applications! Gain valuable experience in developing and maintaining the backend applications that power our platform that powers our applications. You'll learn about API design, database interactions, and software development best practices. Participate in coding, testing, and deploying features, contributing to code reviews, and working with modern backend frameworks. This co-op is your chance to solidify your software engineering skills and make a real impact on our product. Citizenship Requirement N/A APPLICATION INFORMATION Application Procedure Through Employer Website Cover Letter Required? Optional Special Application Instructions Application Link: https://job-boards.greenhouse.io/leagueinc/jobs/5600391004 Our Application Process: Applying to a role you love can be exhausting, and understanding the next steps can feel vague and uncertain. You have done the hard part of submitting your application; let's do ours by sharing potential next steps • You should receive a confirmation email after submitting your application. • A recruiter (not a computer) reviews all applications at League. • If we see alignment with League's needs, a recruiter will reach out to learn more about your goals. The recruiter will also share the team-specific interview process depending on the roles you are exploring. • The final step is an offer, which we hope you will accept! • Prior to joining us, we conduct reference and background checks. Additional checks could be required for US Candidates, depending on the role you are exploring. Please click the "I intend to apply to this position" button on SCOPE and also submit your application via the employer's website. Applications are accepted on a rolling basis and the posting may be expired at any time by the employer as submissions are received. Students should submit their applications as soon as they are ready.
